frontMatter.title: Join Us for Beginner Club Night at Navan Badminton Club
frontMatter.summary: Join Navan Badminton Club for a fun Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium this Thursday from 9pm - 11pm. All skill levels welcome!

prev.title: Open Night at Claremont Stadium
prev.summary: Join us this Wednesday for an open night at Claremont Stadium with all courts open and a session for future legends.
